name: Terrorist Threat Analysis
description: Identifying and assessing potential terrorist threats through intelligence and behavioral analysis.

cards.title: Identifying Radicalization Indicators
cards.description: Understanding behavioral and ideological markers associated with terrorist recruitment.
bulletpoints: Analyze social media activity for extremist rhetoric
Identify recruitment patterns and radicalization pipelines
Monitor changes in behavioral and financial activities
cards.summaryText: Spot early radicalization by scanning social feeds for extremist cues, mapping recruitment pipelines, and tracking behavioral or financial shifts before threats coagulate.

cards.title: Explosive Device Recognition
cards.description: Recognizing common IED components and understanding terrorist attack methodologies.
bulletpoints: Identify chemical precursors and suspicious purchases
Analyze past attack case studies for threat modeling
Understand bomb-making techniques used by terrorist cells
cards.summaryText: Detect improvised explosives by flagging precursor chemical buys, dissecting historical attack playbooks, and decoding assembly techniques favored by terrorist cells.
